item.title: Sheet Pan Roasted Tomato Soup
item.description: All you need for this roasted tomato soup is a sheet pan and a blender. So easy, so cozy, so good.

media:content.media:title: Sheet Pan Roasted Tomato Soup
media:content.media:description: All you need for this roasted tomato soup is a sheet pan and a blender. So easy, so cozy, so good.

item.title: Buttermilk Pumpkin Pancakes
item.description: Perfectly fluffy pumpkin pancakes with the simplest secret: a quick 5-minute batter rest.

item.title: butter board!
item.description: A butter board… but make it spicy, sweet, and salty. The ultimate holiday bite.

item.title: The Viral Feta Pasta With Burrata
item.description: Here's the full recipe: 2 pints cherry tomatoes 1/3 cup olive oil Kosher salt + pepper + pinch crushed red pepper 4 ounces burrata cheese 2 garlic cloves, grated 6 basil leaves, minced 8 ounces pasta of choice (i used rigatoni)

item.title: elite cozy meal: acorn squash soup with a grilled cheese
item.description: The coziest combo ever: silky squash soup + a crispy, melty grilled cheese.

item.title: Delicious Ribollita Soup Recipe
item.description: Ribollita is a rustic Tuscan soup that I love eating when it’s cold outside. It’s a bean and bread soup with beautiful Cannellini Beans. I puree half, which helps thicken the soup. It’s so cozy and delicious!

item.title: Lemony Chicken and Rice Soup with Kale
item.description: Lemony chicken and rice soup with kale: soothing, hearty, and exactly what you want this season.

item.title: Cowboy Casserole But Made My Way
item.description: A comfort classic made my way: rich, cozy, and loaded with extra-crispy tots.

item.title: Brown Butter Scallops with Butternut Squash Risotto
item.description: My ideal weekend plate: buttery scallops and velvety butternut squash risotto. Pure comfort.

item.title: Coquito: Eggnog with Portorican Vibe
item.description: Coconut warmth, sweet flavor… basically the eggnog glow-up we all deserve.

item.title: mint chocolate chip marshmallows on hot cocoa ��☕️
item.description: Minty, chocolatey marshmallows on rich hot cocoa… the perfect cold-weather moment.

item.title: The creamiest flan with the flavors of eggnog
item.description: The creamiest, simplest flan infused with eggnog flavors—pure festive comfort in every bite.

item.title: Pasta Al Limone With Brown Butter Scallops
item.description: Creamy pasta al limone topped with golden brown-butter scallops… pure comfort in every bite.

item.title: Delicious Holiday Season Snacks
item.description: Delicious holiday season snacks that bring all the cozy vibes. Easy, festive, and dangerously good.

item.title: Black Pepper Honey Walnuts With Cranberries Over Gooey Brie
item.description: Gooey brie topped with black pepper honey walnuts + simmered cranberries… and a glass of prosecco. Pure holiday perfection.

item.title: vegetarian “bolognese” pasta ��
item.description: This vegetarian “bolognese” hits hard: slow-simmered carrots, onions, mushrooms, and cauliflower with butter, parm, and fresh parsley.

item.title: Chocolate Mousse Parfaits
item.description: Chocolate mousse + peanut butter layers = the ultimate spoonful of happiness.

item.title: Christmas Morning Stuffed French Toast
item.description: The ultimate Christmas morning treat: stuffed French toast that tastes like pure holiday magic.

item.title: Buffalo Chicken Wrap
item.description: This Buffalo Chicken Wrap is filled with crispy pan-fried chicken, romaine lettuce, ranch dressing and cheese to make the ultimate chicken wrap for lunch or dinner.

item.title: How to Make Delicious Cream Cheese at Home?
item.description: With just three simple ingredients and a few inactive hours, this Homemade Cream Cheese is creamier, fluffier, and more delicious than anything store-bought. You’ll love it smeared on protein bagels or a piece of toast.
